According to Sky News, Abrdn plc, an investment company, is in talks to acquire Interactive Investor Services Ltd, a provider of online investment services, from J.C. Flowers & Co, a US-based private equity firm, for more than GBP1.5 billion (USD2.02 billion). Both Abrdn and Interactive Investor are based in the UK

Reportedly, JPMorgan is acting as financial advisor to Abrdn.
